page.title: 12FAIRLIGHT ACTIVITIES ESUSSEX
page.content:
The Village Hall in Fairlight, East Sussex is the meeting place for the following Clubs which meet once a month: Floral, Gardening, Women's Institute, Winemakers. The first three of these meet during the early afternoon and so are not available to the majority of employed villagers. The Winemakers Club meets at 7.30pm.
Monthly meetings are held at the Village Hall by: an active Residents Association at 7.30pm, the Parish Council at 7pm, the Village Hall Management Committee at 7.30pm, so all of these activities are available to most of the villagers.
Four doctors hold surgeries at noon at the Village Hall on Mondays and Fridays each week.
